title: In support of Teemo, the swift scout
body:
Teemo may be an evil, sadistic, unrepentant killer. But every story needs a villain to test our heroes, to show what they are made of. Would Garen's light seem as bright if it wasn't for Teemo's darkness? Would Soraka seem as merciful if Teemo didn't show us what hate looked like? We should not hate Teemo, but rather thank him. Without a villain, there are no heroes. So in appreciation for all Teemo does to make our favorite champs look great, I bring this fine selection of Teemo fan art. 

http://am.leagueoflegends.com/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2015/june_2015/BOET/FanArt2Teemo_thumb.jpg

http://pre12.deviantart.net/3a7c/th/pre/i/2010/196/5/2/evil_teemo_by_clintosthegreat.jpg

http://pre02.deviantart.net/2a05/th/pre/f/2013/260/a/c/evil_teemo_is_evil_by_fimbulknight-d6mndei.jpg

http://images-cdn.9gag.com/photo/5600296_700b.jpg

replies.body:
Teemo? a villain? please

THIS is a REAL villain 
http://i.imgur.com/gmpDNKe.png

> [{quoted}](name=PopePancake,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=qNEjPxky,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-16T17:40:42.631+0000)
>
> Teemo? a villain? please
> 
> THIS is a REAL villain 
> http://i.imgur.com/gmpDNKe.png

{{champion:44}} Is it not a crime to be this fabulous?

Add my own personal creation to the lot

Timo's **TRUE**form

http://image.prntscr.com/image/fc45b75b01804a4eb1fd5203a2e6a8d9.png
Dying from anything is easier than dying to {{champion:17}}. I can't explain it. It's just extra annoying and I'm just pissed. And I'm usually a very composed guy

Just had Teemo in an ARAM earlier today. Unfortunately I was pretty much the sole damage-dealer so all the enemy had to do was take me down and my team would lose the fight.

I swear people do not utilize his stealth enough. Was an enemy low after the last fight? Get out of vision and hold still- unless they have Oracle's they'll walk right by you- that's when you strike- that's when you kill- that's then they die.
Hup- two- three- four-die.
A as Teemo main, you are welcome, btw Garen is just a easy lane, no offense.
